project.name: Voidgun
project.description: Privacy-via-proxy architecture for Ethereum using Railgun protocol integration

architecture.overview: Voidgun provides privacy pool access through Railgun's battle-tested Groth16 circuits. Keys are derived deterministically from wallet signatures, enabling privacy without new seed phrases.

crates.railgun-lane: Complete Railgun protocol implementation - EdDSA signatures, Groth16 proofs, Merkle sync, note encryption

railgun_lane_modules.artifacts: Circuit artifact management - downloads WASM/ZKEY/VKEY from IPFS
railgun_lane_modules.bip32: BIP32 key derivation for Baby Jubjub curve
railgun_lane_modules.contracts: Railgun contract ABIs, addresses, and calldata builders
railgun_lane_modules.event_loader: Shield/Transact event parsing and Merkle tree building
railgun_lane_modules.keys: EdDSA keys - SpendingKey, ViewingKey, NullifyingKey, RailgunWallet
railgun_lane_modules.lane: PoolLane trait implementation with sync and transfer methods
railgun_lane_modules.rpc: Ethereum RPC client for event syncing

eddsa_circomlib.description: EdDSA on Baby Jubjub using circomlib's Poseidon-based variant
eddsa_circomlib.signing_equation: S = r + H(R, A, M) * s (mod subOrder)
eddsa_circomlib.verification_equation: S * Base8 == R8 + 8 * H(R, A, M) * A
eddsa_circomlib.key_derivation: A = Base8 * (s >> 3) where s is pruned blake512 hash
eddsa_circomlib.coordinate_transform: x_ark = sqrt(168700) * x_circ for arkworks <-> circomlib

circuit_variants.artifacts: WASM for witness, ZKEY for proving, VKEY for verification

key_derivation_flow.step1: User signs domain message with wallet (ECDSA)
key_derivation_flow.step4: Derive BIP32 master key on Baby Jubjub curve

requires.mainnet_rpc: MAINNET_RPC_URL or ETH_RPC_URL for read-only tests

refactor_railgun_only.description: Removed original Voidgun pool implementation, kept only Railgun lane

eddsa_secret_fix.issue: BabyJubjubScalar reduced secret mod field order, breaking s = 8 * (s >> 3)
eddsa_secret_fix.fix: Store secret as raw bytes, use BigUint for arithmetic
